page.title: 10MY DAY PART 1
page.content: My Name is Grace Bentley and I live in Ramsey Chase which is in Latchingdon. I get up between 7.00 and 7.30 a.m. get dressed and go down stairs to have breakfast, which is usually toast and jam, between 7.40 and 7.50. Then I have my hair brushed and clean my teeth. At about 8.20 a.m. I usually sit down and read a book or something until it is time for school. At 8.40 I leave for school and arrive at school and I am in the cloakroom at 8.45 then me and all the other children are in the classroom by about 9.50. First I go down to assembly with my class and then I go back to the classroom about 9.30 I do some work until 10.30 which is playtime then I go and do the menu with my friend and we put up all of the labels for the food we are having for dinner then I go out to play.
